name: Cityfighter
overview: After many furious space battles, the Zygorian battle fleet has landed and conquered most of Earth. Only you in your four phase mobile mega-blaster stand between them and total domination, Choiceville is where you have chosen to stand and fight. Your mission (should you decide to load this tape) is to fight off the evil Zygorian hordes and to rescue the fleeing human families from a fate worse than death, i But beware - the Zygorians are devilishly cunning and will attack you from all sides. You can get shelter behind houses.
